title.rendered: Desire Boardroom Table – Oval – Arrowhead Leg

content.rendered:
Our Desire range of contract desking is ideal for those who want to focus on solid office furniture and their budget. 

The Desire Boardroom Table comes with a 25mm thick oval table top made from contract grade laminate and a 2mm protective edge. Heat resistant and metal to metal fixings for total integrity.

5 year guarantee. This item requires self assembly.
